About Me

Who's this guy?

I am front-end developer currently based in Burbank, CA. With a B.S. in Applied Mathematics, I am a true problem solver. My skills align strongly with front-end web development, however I am learning backend development as well.
Let's get to work!

I know:

  • HTML5
  • CSS3 and SASS
  • JavaScript(ES6)
  • git/Github
  • Adobe Illustrator

I am learning:

  • React.js
  • Node.js (Express)
  • SQL (mySQL)
  • Databases
